g.text: requests employee information (ie. name, address, phone number, e-mail, soc,
createEmployee(role, name, address, phoneNumber, email, soc,
e = createEmployee(role, name, address, phoneNumber, email, soc,
create(id, role, name, address, phoneNumber, email, soc, DIN)
create(id, role, name, address, phoneNumber, email, soc)
shows the data and requests confirmation
